          Checks whether this record is linked to a record of the given table alias.
 boolean IDataAccessor.qbeHasConstraint(ITableAlias alias, IRelationSet relationSet)
          Checks whether any constraint exists for the given table alias and all related table aliases specified by the given relation set.
 void IDataTableRecord.resetLinkedRecord(IDataTransaction transaction, ITableAlias tableAlias)
          Unlinks this record from a record of the given table alias, if existing.
 void IDataTransaction.setHintForNewRecordNumber(ITableAlias alias, int newRecordNumber)
          Gives the transaction a hint of how many new records of a given table alias will be created in the following by means of this transaction.
